General.Name: Birko Birlesik Koyunlulular Mensucat Ticaret ve Sanayi AS
General.Description: Birko Birlesik Koyunlulular Mensucat Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. manufactures and sells machine carpets under the Koyunlu brand in Turkey and internationally. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Nigde, Turkey.
General.Address: Nigde - OSB Bor Yolu 7. Km, Nigde, Turkey

3.Title: HR Mang. & Vice Director of Investor Relations Unit
